name: My2DSideScrollerProject
description:
This is my first game! It was made using the Paper 2D settings in Unreal Engine. It isn't very polished, so my deepest apologies for the weird bugs and other issues. Hopefully, with enough time and practice, I can polish my skills. 

Credits for the character sprites, artwork, and other assets used:

LuizMelo for the Mushroom and Goblin enemies.

ClemBod for the Female Warrior sprites and animation.
